alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Magoffin; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:28PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Morgan, northern Breathitt, northwestern Magoffin and southeastern Wolfe Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Malaga, or 8 miles east of Campton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rosefork, Shockey, Lee City, Helechawa, Taulbee and Sellars around 1235 PM EDT. Belknap, Burkhart, Adele, Rock Lick, Cannel City and Payton around 1240 PM EDT. Cutuno, Dale, Wheel Rim, Burg, Netty, Mountain Valley, Bays and Caney around 1245 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Seiltz, Puncheon, Eugene, Epson, Hager, Cornelia, Lykins, Harper, Holliday, Fritz, Ova, Stella, Kernie, Bethanna, Patton, Wonnie, Bloomington, Salyersville, Mason, Hendricks, Gullett, Lakesville, Foraker, Gifford, Elsie, Conley Station and Sublett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
